title: Reminder
author: The Weeknd
lyrics:
[00:00.60] Know me
[00:01.89] Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
[00:02.93] Know me
[00:04.20] Oh, na-na-na-na-na-na
[00:05.96] Know me
[00:07.29] Whoa
[00:08.77] Know, me
[00:11.99] I used to pray to hear my songs on the radio
[00:14.74] Growing up, my foot was only after kickin' doors
[00:17.50] Keep sixty bitches backstage, at like every show
[00:20.51] Ain't no more Hanes on my balls, these are Kenneth Cole
[00:23.89] All these squares in my pictures, yeah we cropping those
[00:26.41] Let 'lil shawty lick my dick, I had my boxers on
[00:29.52] Everybody 'round me popping, bitch we kettle corn
[00:32.40] Private, PJ on the e-way with the P-1
[00:35.74] Carat and a half dripping on my neck, son
[00:38.46] Take a bubble bath with a rapper's baby mom
[00:41.50] Young dirty nigga rocking, wylin like a swamp
[00:44.72] Yeah, I just fucked up last night, didn't tell 'em my name
[00:48.32] All these hip-hop rappers down to be Drake
[00:51.35] All my double cups purple like the soul plane (na-na-na-na-na)
[00:55.02] Diamonds on me loud, got you silent
[00:57.66] Got her bouncing on this dick like hydraulics
[00:59.50] Cause you know me, you know me
[01:04.59] You know me, you know me
[01:11.25] Every time we try to forget who I am
[01:14.28] I'll be right there to remind you again
[01:17.09] You know me (pow, pow!), you know me
[01:23.45] Recommend play my song on the radio
[01:26.64] You too busy tryna find that blue-eyed soul
[01:29.74] I let my black hair grow and my weed smoke
[01:32.64] And I swear too much on the regular
[01:35.44] We gon' let them hits fly, we gon' let it go
[01:38.58] If it ain't XO then it gotta go
[01:41.44] I just won a new award for a kids show
[01:44.51] Talking 'bout a face numbing off a bag of blow
[01:47.87] I'm like, goddamn, bitch, I am not a Teen Choice
[01:51.22] Goddamn, bitch, I am not a Bleach boy
[01:54.42] Whip game, make a nigga understand though
[01:57.44] Got that Hannibal, Silence of the Lambo
[02:00.36] Hit the gas so hard, make it rotate
[02:03.27] All my niggas blew up like a propane
[02:06.19] All these R'n'B niggas be so lame
[02:09.18] Got a sweet Asian chick, she go Lo Mein
[02:14.02] You know me, you know me, you know me
[02:23.22] Every time we try to forget who I am
[02:26.18] I'll be right there to remind you again
[02:29.18] You know me (pow, pow!), you know me
[02:34.10] Ugh
[02:35.80] Young, young nigga, same OG, stayin' low-key
[02:39.46] Stayin' ten toes deep
[02:41.03] Both feet says G (says)
[02:43.26] Maybe B says I'm a G
[02:45.12] I'm a weakness, like The Weeknd, smoking weed man
[02:49.15] I beg your pardon
[02:50.35] It's true, the rumors that they start 'gone make us break apart
[02:53.28] Assuming they've influenced all this
[02:55.17] Sudden change of heart (change of what?)
[02:56.76] The voice recording take off with the whole thing
[02:58.87] 'Mind them that they know me
[03:01.36] No way you think if ever I decide to cut my hair like Abel
[03:04.42] Just like Jaden Smith, I'll probably walk around a day with it
[03:07.01] Okay, you lame, I'm a-okay with it
[03:08.95] Might take the pepper around my old ways
[03:11.04] 'Mind them that they know me
[03:12.38] 'Cause, you know me, you know me
[03:16.85] You know me, you know me
[03:23.49] Every time we try to forget who I am
[03:26.42] I'll be right there to remind you again
[03:29.48] You know me (pow, pow!), you know me
[03:32.83]
